name: Cave Escape (itch) (Jimber)
description:
Every 10s the floor will change, find a way to escape!

WASD - Moving

C - Roll

Space - Jump

E - interaction

The green floor is the safe floor, others are not safe

You can get many props on the map, and can interact with the map, change the map, and become a favourable condition for you to move up!

Here is the gameplay video on Youtube!
